mapper.select: select count(*) from user_rating where user_id = #{user_id} and item_id = #{item_id}
mapper.update: update user_rating set rating = #{rating} where item_id = #{item_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select item_id, cast(floor(age / 10) - 1 as signed integer) "age", avg(rating) "rating" from user, user_rating where user.username = user_rating.user_id group by item_id, "age"
select item_id, gender, avg(rating) "rating" from user, user_rating where user.username = user_rating.user_id group by item_id, gender
